content: TE-H AC Asphalt cutter chisels Extra-sharp asphalt cutter chisels for faster, more precise breaking up of asphalt or hard-packed gravel using the third-gen TE 3000 or H28 demolition tools with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed, high-performance asphalt cutting chisel – sharpened edges for faster and more precise cutting of asphalt Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the cutting edge Better reliability – these asphalt chisels are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Cutting asphalt or hard-packed gravel For use with third-generation TE 3000 electric jackhammers and H28 demolition tools with clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) Application: Asphalt cutting Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-H (Hilti HEX 28) | Application | Asphalt cutting | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2254755 - Asphalt cutter TE-HX AC 42/12 - Package Size 1 pc - 2428759 - Asphalt chisel TE-H AC 42/12.5 - Package Size 1 pc - 2254757 - Asphalt cutter TE-HX AC 50/12 - Package Size 1 pc
